title: Fishers of men,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: Thus it came to pass that Baby Lant's Athenian predilection  for telling and hearing some new thing defeated the strategy of that strong man Billy Earsman, that careful  man Archbold Molesay — not to speak of Hearne Mackenzie  and a good half score of warders whom Carvel had bidden to be on the lookout for Mad Mag coming along the Edinburgh Road.
